body_html: It seems that the configure script ONLY works with the defaults. The error occurs if you change anything. As of release r0.7, the configure script SAYS the default is cuda 7.0, even though the release notes say it uses cuda 7.5. When I tried to tell configure I wanted 7.5, I got the error above. If I let it use the default, it worked and I verified that the libraries in the bazel genfiles cache were actually 7.5 and cudnn 4.0.7.
